publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 12
ab.l: Da ajtyrsyn ol ḱuńd́a maḥtav b́eŕajim H-ɣa ḥot́ej ki ačuvlanyb́edi ḿeńd́a qajt- syn ačuvuj da uvutḥun ḿeni.
Muna T́eńri jarlyɣašym išana- myn da qorḥmejmyn ki ḱuč́um da maḥtavym T́eńri H da boldu maja jarlyɣašḥa.
Da śuźarsiź suvlar bijańč́ byla ḱoź suvlaryndan ol jarlyɣašnyn.
Da ajtyrsyz ol ḱuńd́a maḥtav b́erijiź H-ɣa čaɣy- rajyz šemińa bildirijiź uluslarda tamaša iš́ĺariń saɣyndyryjyz ki kiptir šemi anyn.
Źeḿer oḥujuz H-ɣa ki ulluḥ qyldy b́u- ĺuv́ĺu bolur bu bar ol jerd́a.
Ḱot́urǵuń avazyjny da bijańgiń olturuvčusu Cijonnun ki ulludur šemi ortejda aziź T́eńrij śeniń Jisraʾeĺ.
